thread.title: French rail unions take on Macron with rolling strikes

title: French rail unions take on Macron with rolling strikes
text:
French rail unions take on Macron with rolling strikes 11:02am EDT - 01:52 
French rail workers launched the first in a series of nationwide strikes on Tuesday, threatening disruption over several months in the sternest challenge yet to President Emmanuel Macron's resolve to modernise Europe's second biggest economy. Kate King reports.
